question_text: Why is it important to match polarity when connecting front panel LEDs to the pin headers?
answer_options: Incorrect polarity causes system boot failure
LEDs are polarized and will not light if reversed
LEDs control fan speed through PWM
correct_answer: LEDs are polarized and will not light if reversed
explanation: LEDs require correct polarity to function. Reversing the connector won't damage the system but will prevent illumination.
